turns.utterance: Do you like hiking? I really wanna hike The Ozark Trail
turns.response: Yes I love hiking, I've always loved the views on my hikes.

turns.utterance: Ozark trail is still under construction but it's intended to reach from St. Luis to Arkansas
turns.response: Sounds like a very long and interesting trail, I may have to visit it some day.

turns.utterance: I know, that's why i wanna go there! The trail is currently composed of thirteen sections
turns.response: Wow 13 sections. I bet it has a great view, I'll have to bring my camera.

turns.utterance: what's cool is that sections vary in length so people can choose where they want to hike
turns.response: That sounds great, Good for people who don't want to do the whole length in one go.

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
